html: (2 Nephi 19:11)."The Lord shall set up the adversaries of Rezin against him." The possible meaning of this phrase has been provided by J. R. Dummelow: "Perhaps we should read [as do some Hebrew manuscripts] 'the princes of Rezin' [the king of Syria]; the meaning would then be that the Syrian allies of Israel [Isaiah 7:1-2] will turn against it." (TOVBC, 421-22.)
